verses.verse: I <WG1473> therefore,<WG3767> the<WG3588> prisoner<WG1198> of<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> beseech<WG3870> you<WG5209> that ye walk<WG4043> worthy<WG516> of the<WG3588> vocation<WG2821> wherewith<WG3739> ye are called,<WG2564>
With <WG3326> all<WG3956> lowliness<WG5012> and<WG2532> meekness,<WG4236> with<WG3326> longsuffering,<WG3115> forbearing<WG430> one another<WG240> in<WG1722> love;<WG26>
Endeavoring <WG4704> to keep<WG5083> the<WG3588> unity<WG1775> of the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> bond<WG4886> of peace.<WG1515>
There is one<WG1520> body,<WG4983> and<WG2532> one<WG1520> Spirit,<WG4151> even as<WG2531> ye are called<WG2564> in<WG1722> one<WG3391> hope<WG1680> of your<WG5216> calling;<WG2821>
One <WG1520> Lord,<WG2962> one<WG3391> faith,<WG4102> one<WG1520> baptism,<WG908>
One <WG1520> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962> of all,<WG3956> who<WG3588> is above<WG1909> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> through<WG1223> all,<WG3956> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> you<WG5213> all.<WG3956>
But <WG1161> unto every<WG1538> one<WG1520> of us<WG2257> is given<WG1325> grace<WG5485> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> measure<WG3358> of the<WG3588> gift<WG1431> of Christ.<WG5547>
Wherefore <WG1352> he saith,<WG3004> When he ascended up<WG305> on<WG1519> high,<WG5311> he led captivity captive,<WG162> <WG161> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> gifts<WG1390> unto men.<WG444>

(Now <WG1161> that<WG3588> he ascended,<WG305> what<WG5101> is<WG2076> it but<WG1508> that<WG3754> he also<WG2532> descended<WG2597> first<WG4412> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> lower<WG2737> parts<WG3313> of the<WG3588> earth?<WG1093>
He that descended<WG2597> is<WG2076> the same<WG846> also<WG2532> that ascended up<WG305> far above<WG5231> all<WG3956> heavens,<WG3772> that<WG2443> he might fill<WG4137> all things.)<WG3956>

And <WG2532> he<WG846> gave<WG1325> some,<WG3588> <WG3303> apostles;<WG652> and<WG1161> some,<WG3588> prophets;<WG4396> and<WG1161> some,<WG3588> evangelists;<WG2099> and<WG1161> some,<WG3588> pastors<WG4166> and<WG2532> teachers;<WG1320>

For <WG4314> the<WG3588> perfecting<WG2677> of the<WG3588> saints,<WG40> for<WG1519> the work<WG2041> of the ministry,<WG1248> for<WG1519> the edifying<WG3619> of the<WG3588> body<WG4983> of Christ: <WG5547>

Till <WG3360> we all<WG3956> come<WG2658> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> unity<WG1775> of the<WG3588> faith,<WG4102> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> knowledge<WG1922> of the<WG3588> Son<WG5207> of God,<WG2316> unto<WG1519> a perfect<WG5046> man,<WG435> unto<WG1519> the measure<WG3358> of the stature<WG2244> of the<WG3588> fullness<WG4138> of Christ: <WG5547>

That <WG2443> we henceforth be<WG5600> no more<WG3371> children,<WG3516> tossed to and fro,<WG2831> and<WG2532> carried about<WG4064> with every<WG3956> wind<WG417> of doctrine,<WG1319> by<WG1722> the<WG3588> sleight<WG2940> of men,<WG444> and<WG1722> cunning craftiness,<WG3834> whereby<WG4314> they lie in wait to deceive;<WG3180> <WG4106>

But <WG1161> speaking the truth<WG226> in<WG1722> love,<WG26> may grow up<WG837> into<WG1519> him<WG846> in all things,<WG3956> which<WG3739> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> head,<WG2776> even Christ: <WG5547>

From <WG1537> whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> whole<WG3956> body<WG4983> fitly joined together<WG4883> and<WG2532> compacted<WG4822> by<WG1223> that which every<WG3956> joint<WG860> supplieth,<WG2024> according<WG2596> to the effectual working<WG1753> in<WG1722> the measure<WG3358> of every<WG1538> <WG1520> part,<WG3313> maketh<WG4160> increase<WG838> of the<WG3588> body<WG4983> unto<WG1519> the edifying<WG3619> of itself<WG1438> in<WG1722> love.<WG26>

This <WG5124> I say<WG3004> therefore,<WG3767> and<WG2532> testify<WG3143> in<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> that ye<WG5209> henceforth walk not<WG3371> <WG4043> as<WG2531> <WG2532> other<WG3062> Gentiles<WG1484> walk,<WG4043> in<WG1722> the vanity<WG3153> of their<WG848> mind,<WG3563>

Having the<WG3588> understanding<WG1271> darkened,<WG4654> being<WG5607> alienated<WG526> from the<WG3588> life<WG2222> of God<WG2316> through<WG1223> the<WG3588> ignorance<WG52> that is<WG5607> in<WG1722> them,<WG846> because<WG1223> of the<WG3588> blindness<WG4457> of their<WG846> heart: <WG2588>
Who <WG3748> being past feeling<WG524> have given themselves over<WG3860> <WG1438> unto lasciviousness,<WG766> to<WG1519> work<WG2039> all<WG3956> uncleanness<WG167> with<WG1722> greediness.<WG4124>
But <WG1161> ye<WG5210> have not<WG3756> so<WG3779> learned<WG3129> Christ;<WG5547>
If so be<WG1489> that ye have heard<WG191> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> have been taught<WG1321> by<WG1722> him,<WG846> as<WG2531> the truth<WG225> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> Jesus: <WG2424>

That ye<WG5209> put off<WG659> concerning<WG2596> the<WG3588> former<WG4387> conversation<WG391> the<WG3588> old<WG3820> man,<WG444> which is corrupt<WG5351> according<WG2596> to the<WG3588> deceitful<WG539> lusts;<WG1939>
And <WG1161> be renewed<WG365> in the<WG3588> spirit<WG4151> of your<WG5216> mind;<WG3563>
And <WG2532> that ye put on<WG1746> the<WG3588> new<WG2537> man,<WG444> which after<WG2596> God<WG2316> is created<WG2936> in<WG1722> righteousness<WG1343> and<WG2532> true<WG225> holiness.<WG3742>

Wherefore <WG1352> putting away<WG659> lying,<WG5579> speak<WG2980> every man<WG1538> truth<WG225> with<WG3326> his<WG848> neighbor:<WG4139> for<WG3754> we are<WG2070> members<WG3196> one of another.<WG240>
Be ye angry,<WG3710> and<WG2532> sin<WG264> not: let<WG3361> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> sun<WG2246> go down<WG1931> upon<WG1909> your<WG5216> wrath: <WG3950>
Neither <WG3383> give<WG1325> place<WG5117> to the<WG3588> devil.<WG1228>

Let him that stole<WG2813> steal<WG2813> no more:<WG3371> but<WG1161> rather<WG3123> let him labor,<WG2872> working<WG2038> with his hands<WG5495> the thing which is good,<WG18> that<WG2443> he may have<WG2192> to give<WG3330> to him that needeth.<WG2192> <WG5532>

Let no<WG3361> <WG3956> corrupt<WG4550> communication<WG3056> proceed<WG1607> out of<WG1537> your<WG5216> mouth,<WG4750> but<WG235> that<WG1536> which is good<WG18> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> use<WG5532> of edifying,<WG3619> that<WG2443> it may minister<WG1325> grace<WG5485> unto the<WG3588> hearers.<WG191>
And <WG2532> grieve<WG3076> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> of God,<WG2316> whereby<WG1722> <WG3739> ye are sealed<WG4972> unto<WG1519> the day<WG2250> of redemption.<WG629>

Let all<WG3956> bitterness,<WG4088> and<WG2532> wrath,<WG2372> and<WG2532> anger,<WG3709> and<WG2532> clamor,<WG2906> and<WG2532> evil speaking,<WG988> be put away<WG142> from<WG575> you,<WG5216> with<WG4862> all<WG3956> malice: <WG2549>

And <WG1161> be<WG1096> ye kind<WG5543> one to another,<WG240> <WG1519> tenderhearted,<WG2155> forgiving<WG5483> one another,<WG1438> even<WG2532> as<WG2531> God<WG2316> for Christ's sake<WG1722> <WG5547> hath forgiven<WG5483> you.<WG5213>
